description.gpt3: G0206 is a code for Diagnostic mammography, which is a special X-ray of the breasts used to find problems such as tumors. The code includes computer-aided detection (cad), which means that a computer is used to help find tumors that might not be seen on the X-ray alone. description.gpt3: A colonoscopy is a test that doctors use to check for colon cancer. They put a long, thin tube with a tiny camera on the end into the person's rectum and then guide it up into the colon. During the procedure, the doctor may remove small tissue samples (biopsies) to be checked for cancer. The test is considered "not high risk" if the person does not have any symptoms or family history of colon cancer.
description.long: Colorectal cancer screening; colonoscopy on individual not meeting criteria for high risk.
description.short: Colon ca scrn; not hi risk ind

description.gpt3: With colon cancer being one of the leading causes of cancer death in the US, it's important to screen for it early. The G0105 code is used to identify high-risk individuals and screen them accordingly. This usually means a colonoscopy, which is a procedure to look inside the colon for any signs of cancer.
description.long: Colorectal cancer screening; colonoscopy on individual at high risk.

description.gpt3: The doctor is talking to the patient about having a colonoscopy screening done. This is a procedure where the doctor looks inside the colon (large intestine) for polyps or cancer. The doctor will do a physical exam and ask questions about the patient's medical history. The doctor may also order tests, such as a blood test or CT scan.

description.gpt3:
A barium enema is a test used to help diagnose problems with the large intestine (colon). The test is also called a lower gastrointestinal (GI) series. 

For the test, a health care provider inserts a special tube into your rectum. Then, liquid barium is put into your rectum through the tube. The barium coats the inside of your colon and rectum so that they can be seen more clearly on an x-ray.

An x-ray is taken of your lower GI tract. The x-ray pictures are studied to check for any problems, such as an enlarge ment of the intestine, blockage of the intestine, or ulcers.
description.long: Colorectal cancer screening; alternative to g0105, screening colonoscopy, barium enema.

description.gpt3: Spinal fusion is an operation to permanently join two or more bones in your spine. The bones most often fused are the vertebrae, which are the bones that make up your spine. The operation can be performed on any part of the spine, but the most common area is the lower back.

description.gpt3: A knee replacement is a surgery where they replace a person's knee with a artificial knee.

description.gpt3: In a spinal fusion, two or more bones in the spine (backbone) are joined together so that they heal into one solid bone. Anterior means "from the front." So, in this type of spinal fusion, the surgeon approaches the spine from the front.

description.gpt3: A hysterectomy is a surgery where the doctor removes a woman's uterus. The adnexa are the structures next to the uterus, and so this type of surgery also removes those structures. This procedure is done when there is a non-malignant, or non-cancerous, condition.

description.gpt3: This is a code for a medical procedure. Anesthesia is a way to numb the body so that you don't feel pain. This particular code is for anesthesia that would be given to a woman who is delivering a baby vaginally.
Anesthesia is a way of making someone feel asleep or pain-free during a medical procedure. A cesarean delivery is when a baby is born through an incision (cut) in the mother's belly and uterus.

Anesthesia for labor during planned vaginal delivery means that the woman will be given anesthesia so that she does not feel pain during labor. This is usually done with an epidural or a spinal block.

description.gpt3:
A biopsy is when a doctor takes a small sample of tissue from the body to look at under a microscope. They may do this to check for cancer or other problems.

A fine needle biopsy means that the doctor uses a very thin needle to take the tissue sample.

An ultrasound is a test that uses sound waves to create a picture of the inside of the body. The doctor may use ultrasound to help them guide the needle to the right place to take the biopsy.

The first lesion means that this is the first time the doctor has taken a biopsy from this particular area.
description.long: Fine needle aspiration biopsy, including ultrasound guidance; first lesion.

This means that a doctor has performed a biopsy (a medical procedure in which a small sample of tissue is removed from the body for examination) using a needle, but did not use any imaging (such as x-rays) to guide the needle.

If the abscess is small and only has a little pus in it, your doctor can make a tiny cut and drain the pus out. If the abscess is bigger and has a lot of pus, your doctor will make a bigger cut and drain out all of the pus.

Injections to remove spider veins are done with a needle and help to break up the veins so they are no longer visible.

description.gpt3: The tonsils and adenoids are two glands located in the throat. The tonsils are located at the back of the throat and the adenoids are located just behind the nose. The tonsils and adenoids help to filter germs and bacteria that enter the body through the nose and mouth.

description.gpt3: A colonoscopy is a medical procedure where a long, thin tube with a tiny camera on the end is inserted into the person's rectum and passed through the large intestine. The camera allows the doctor to see the inside of the intestine and look for any problems, such as inflammation, bleeding, or polyps. If the doctor sees any polyps, they may use a tool on the endoscope to remove them or take a biopsy (a small sample of tissue) to check for cancer. Band ligation is a procedure where the doctor ties a small rubber band around a polyp to cut off the blood supply to the polyp. This causes the polyp to fall off and be passed out of the body in the person's stool.
description.long: Tying of large bowel using an endoscope.

description.gpt3: The doctor will make tiny incisions in your belly and insert an endoscope (a long, thin tube with a tiny camera on the end) into your body. They will use the endoscope to guide tiny surgical tools to your gallbladder and remove it.
description.long: Removal of gallbladder using an endoscope.

description.gpt3: The gallbladder is a small sac under the liver that stores bile, which helps the body break down fats. Sometimes the gallbladder can become inflamed or full of stones, and when this happens it needs to be removed. This operation is called a laparoscopic cholecystectomy. The surgeon will make a few small cuts in the abdomen and insert a tiny camera and other instruments through the cuts. The surgeon will then remove the gallbladder and methodically check the bile ducts for any stones that may have fallen into them.
description.long: Gallbladder removal with use of an x-ray exam of the bile ducts.

description.gpt3: A groin hernia is when part of your intestines push through a weak spot in your groin muscle. If you're five years old or older, your doctor may do an operation to fix it.
description.long: Repair of groin hernia patient age 5 years or older.

description.gpt3: This medical code means that a doctor repaired an umbilical hernia in a patient who is over five years old.
description.long: Repair of umbilical hernia in patients over 5 years old.

description.gpt3: A hernia is when an organ or tissue sticks out through a hole in the muscle. An inguinal hernia is when this happens in the groin area. The surgery to fix it is called a laparoscopic inguinal hernia repair. The doctor makes a tiny cut in the belly and then puts a thin, long tube with a camera on the end of it (laparoscope) into the belly. The camera shows the doctor what is going on inside. The doctor then does the surgery through the other tiny cuts.
description.long: Inguinal hernia repair done by laparoscope.

description.gpt3: There are a few different ways that doctors can break up and remove kidney stones. One way is called extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy. This is when doctors use sound waves to break up the kidney stones from outside of the body. Another way is when the doctor puts a tube through the patient's back and into the kidney. Then the doctor uses a laser to break up the stones.
description.long: Surgical procedures on the kidney to break up and remove kidney stones.

description.gpt3: A doctor might use this test to measure how quickly urine is flowing. They would do this by using a machine that has a small tube that goes into the person's urethra (the part of the body where urine comes out). The machine would measure how much urine comes out in a certain amount of time.
description.long: A diagnostic test used to measure the flow of urine.

description.gpt3: This medical term refers to a procedure where doctors use ultrasound technology to take measurements of a person's bladder in order to gauge how much urine it can hold.
description.long: Ultrasound of bladder to measure urine capacity.

description.gpt3: A cystoscopy is a medical procedure used to look at the inside of the bladder. A cystoscope, a thin, tube-like instrument with a light and a camera, is inserted into the bladder through the urethra (the tube that carries urine out of the body). The doctor can then see the inside of the bladder and look for any problems.
description.long: Procedure on the bladder.

description.gpt3:
A ureteral stent is a thin tube that is inserted into the ureter (the tube that drains urine from the kidney to the bladder) to help relieve a blockage or obstruction. In some cases, the stent may be left in place for an extended period of time.

In this procedure, the stent is removed by cystoscopy, which is a minimally invasive procedure that uses a small camera to visualize the inside of the bladder and urethra. The camera is inserted through the urethra and into the bladder, and the stent is removed using small instruments.
description.long: Removing an indwelling ureteral stent by cystoscopy.

description.gpt3: A ureteral stent is a tube that goes from a person's kidney to their bladder. It is put in place to help urine drain from the kidney to the bladder. The stent will stay in place for a while, until it is no longer needed.
description.long: Ureteral stents inserted internally between the bladder and the kidney and will remain within the patient for a defined period of time.

description.gpt3: The vas deferens is a tube that carries sperm from the testicles to the urethra. The urethra is the tube that urine and sperm pass through when they leave the body.
description.long: Removal of sperm duct(s).
description.short: EXCISION PROCEDURES ON THE VAS DEFERENS

description.gpt3: A prostate biopsy is a medical procedure that involves taking a small sample of tissue from the prostate gland. The tissue is then examined under a microscope to look for any abnormal cells. Prostate biopsy is often performed to confirm a diagnosis of prostate cancer.
description.long: Biopsy of prostate gland.

description.gpt3: Prostate surgery is when the doctor removes the prostate gland and the nearby lymph nodes. This is done using an endoscope, which is a long, thin tube with a camera on the end. The endoscope goes into the body through a small cut in the skin. The camera lets the doctor see the prostate gland and the nearby lymph nodes. The doctor then removes the prostate gland and the lymph nodes.
description.long: Surgical removal of prostate and surrounding lymph nodes using an endoscope.

description.gpt3: After a woman has a baby, there can be a build-up of blood in the vaginal area. To get rid of this blood, and to prevent any health problems, a doctor will make a small cut (incision) and then drain the blood.
description.short: Incision and drainage of vaginal blood accumulation following delivery

description.gpt3: A bladder defect is when there is something wrong with the bladder, such as a hole or a tear. In order to fix this, the doctor will replace the sling, which is a piece of material that supports the bladder.
description.long: Replacement of sling to support the bladder.

description.gpt3: A curette is a sharp, spoon-shaped instrument that is used to scrape tissue from the cervix or uterus. A biopsy is when a small sample of tissue is taken from the body for further testing.
description.long: Biopsy of cervix or uterus.

description.gpt3: A "biopsy of the lining of the uterus" is when a doctor removes a small piece of tissue from the lining of the uterus (the part of the uterus that sheds during menstruation). The tissue is then sent to a laboratory to be tested for cancer.
description.long: Biopsy of the lining of the uterus.
description.short: EXCISION PROCEDURES ON THE CORPUS UTERI

description.gpt3: During a hysteroscopy, a doctor inserts a small tube with a tiny camera on the end through the vagina and up into the uterus. This lets the doctor see inside the uterus and look for any problems. If the doctor sees anything abnormal, they may do a biopsy, which means taking a small sample of tissue for testing.
description.long: Surgical hysteroscopy with biopsy.

description.gpt3: A Hysteroscopy is a surgical procedure used to treat premenopausal abnormal uterine bleeding. This means that if a woman is having bleeding that is not related to her period, a hysteroscopy can be used to help figure out what is causing the bleeding and to potentially stop it.
description.long: Surgical procedure used to treat premenopausal abnormal uterine bleeding.

description.gpt3: Hysteroscopy is looking inside the uterus through a telescope. This can be done for different reasons like finding out why you are having heavy periods or finding out why you are having trouble getting pregnant. Sterilization is when a woman can no longer have children. This can be done different ways but laparoscopic is when a small telescope is inserted through a small cut in the belly button.
description.long: Laparoscopic/Hysteroscopic Procedures on the uterus.

description.gpt3: Laparoscopic hysterectomy is a surgery to remove the uterus through small incisions in the abdomen. A laparoscope is a thin, lighted tube that goes through the incisions. The surgeon uses the laparoscope to see inside the abdomen and to guide the surgical instruments.
description.long: Laparoscopic hysterectomy.

description.gpt3: A laparoscope is a long, thin tube with a light on the end. A surgeon inserts the laparoscope through a small cut in the patient's belly. The light on the end of the laparoscope helps the surgeon see the inside of the patient's belly. The surgeon uses the laparoscope to remove tissue from the uterus, ovaries, fallopian tubes, or surrounding tissues.
description.long: Removal of either benign or malignant tissue from the uterus, ovaries, fallopian tubes, or any of the surrounding tissues using a laparoscope.

description.gpt3: A surgeon will make a few small cuts in the patient's belly. Then, the surgeon will put a long, thin tube called a laparoscope into the patient's belly. A camera on the end of the laparoscope will show the surgeon what's going on inside the patient's belly. The surgeon will also put other thin, metal tubes called instruments into the patient's belly through the same cuts. These instruments will help the surgeon remove the patient's ovaries, fallopian tubes, and other pelvic organs.
description.long: Removal of lesions of the ovary, pelvic viscera, or peritoneal surface.

description.gpt3: Laparoscopic tubal sterilization is a surgery to block the fallopian tubes so that pregnancy cannot occur. The fallopian tubes are the tubes that carry an egg from the ovary to the uterus, and so by blocking them, pregnancy cannot occur.
description.long: Laparoscopic tubal sterilization is surgery to block the fallopian tubes to prevent pregnancy.

description.gpt3: When a woman is pregnant, her baby grows inside a sac of fluid called the amniotic sac. Sometimes, doctors need to take a sample of this fluid to test for certain conditions. This procedure is called amniocentesis. A needle is inserted into the amniotic sac through the woman's abdomen, and a small amount of fluid is removed. The fluid is then tested in a laboratory.
description.long: Removal of amniotic fluid from the uterus for diagnostic purposes.

description.gpt3: A Fetal Non-Stress Test is a common prenatal test used to check on a baby's health. The test is done by putting sensors on the mother's stomach to measure the baby's heart rate. The heart rate is monitored for any changes that might indicate a problem.
description.long: A common prenatal test used to check on a baby's health.

description.gpt3: This is a code used by doctors and insurers to describe a type of care given to a pregnant woman before and after she gives birth, as well as during her vaginal delivery.
description.long: Obstetrical pre- and postpartum care and vaginal delivery.

description.gpt3: In order to have a vaginal delivery, the baby's head must come down into the birth canal and the body must rotate so that the baby is born facing the mother's back.
This means that a woman gave birth vaginally (without a C-section) and received post-delivery care.
The placenta is a organ that grows in the uterus during pregnancy. It provides nutrition and oxygen to the growing baby. The placenta is delivered through the vagina after the baby is born.
This means that the person will have 4-6 visits from a health care professional before their baby is born. This is to make sure that the person and their baby are healthy and doing well.
The term "59426 Pre-delivery care 7 or more visits" means that the patient will receive seven or more prenatal visits before the baby is born.

A cesarean delivery is a type of surgery used to deliver a baby. The doctor makes a cut in the mother's abdomen and uterus to get the baby out. Pre- and post-delivery care means that the mother and baby will be cared for before and after the surgery.
description.long: Cesarean delivery with pre- and post-delivery care.

description.gpt3: A Cesarean delivery is when the baby is born through an incision in the mother's abdomen.

A cesarean delivery is a type of surgery used to deliver a baby. The doctor makes a cut in the mother's abdomen and then removes the baby from the uterus. Post-delivery care is the care that the mother and baby receive after the delivery.
This means that the person giving birth has already had a baby through surgery (cesarean delivery), but this time they are trying to have the baby vaginally.
description.long: Vaginal delivery after prior cesarean delivery.

description.gpt3: The patient has had a cesarean delivery before, and is now delivering vaginally.
description.short: Vaginal delivery after prior cesarean delivery

description.gpt3: This means that the person has had a cesarean delivery before and is now having a vaginal delivery. The care after delivery will be post-delivery care.
description.short: Vaginal delivery after prior cesarean delivery with post-delivery care

description.gpt3: A person has a needle inserted into their lower back near the spine. They may be lying on their stomach or on their side. The area is numbed with medicine and then the needle is inserted into the space around the spine. Sometimes imaging is used to guide the needle into the right spot. Medication is then injected into the space around the spine. This is done to help manage pain.
description.long: Injection of substance into spinal canal of lower back or sacrum using imaging guidance.

description.gpt3: A doctor needs to inject a substance into the spinal canal of a person's lower back or sacrum. In order to do this, the doctor will use an imaging machine to guide them.
description.short: Injection of substance into spinal canal of lower back or sacrum using imaging guidance

description.gpt3: The doctor is going to do a surgery to take the pressure off of a herniated vertebra. This will help to relieve the pain that is being caused by the herniated vertebra.
description.long: Surgical procedure to decompress a herniated vertebra.

description.gpt3: A transforaminal epidural injection is a pain-relieving treatment for back pain. A doctor gave a needle with a local anesthetic and/or a steroid drug into the low back near a nerve root. Imaging guidance is used so that the needle is placed in the right spot.
description.long: Injections of anesthetic and/or steroid drug into lower or sacral spine nerve root using imaging guidance.

description.gpt3: The doctor gave the patient a shot in their lower back to numb the nerves using a machine to help guide them.
description.long: Injection into lower back of nerve block using imaging guidance.

description.gpt3: Carpal tunnel surgery is a procedure to release the pressure on the median nerve in your wrist. The carpal tunnel is a small space in your wrist surrounded by bones and ligaments. The median nerve runs through the carpal tunnel and gives feeling to your thumb and first three fingers. When the transverse carpal ligament, one of the ligaments surrounding the carpal tunnel, is too tight, it puts pressure on the median nerve and causes carpal tunnel syndrome. In carpal tunnel surgery, the transverse carpal ligament is cut to relieve pressure on the median nerve and improve carpal tunnel syndrome symptoms.
description.long: Release of the transverse carpal ligament.

description.gpt3: In this surgery, a laser is used to remove a cataract that has come back. The laser makes a small hole in the lens capsule, which is the part of the eye that holds the lens. This allows the surgeon to take out the cataract and then put a new lens in the eye.
description.long: Removal of recurring cataract in lens capsule using laser.

description.gpt3: A cataract is like a cloudy film that covers the eye and makes it hard to see. To fix it, the doctor needs to remove the cataract and then put in a new lens.
description.long: Removal of cataract with insertion of lens.

description.gpt3: When you have an eye infection, the doctor may give you a shot of medicine directly into your eye. This is called an eye injection.
description.long: Injection of a pharmaceutical agent into the eye.

description.gpt3: Ear wax is a yellowish, waxy substance that is produced by the glands in the ear. It helps to protect the ear from dirt and bacteria. Sometimes, ear wax can build up and become hard. This can cause it to become impacted, which means it is difficult to remove. In order to remove impacted ear wax, a doctor will use a small, curved instrument to gently break up the wax and then suction it out.
description.long: Removal of ear wax from one or both ears.

description.gpt3: This is a medical procedure where a doctor inserts tubes into a patient's ears. This is often done to help with hearing problems.
description.long: Insertion of tubes into one or both ears.

description.gpt3: A CT scan is a test that uses X-rays and computers to create detailed pictures of your head or brain. CT stands for computed tomography. The test is also called a CAT scan. A CT scan can be used to diagnose problems in your head or brain, such as tumors, bleeding, or injury. It can also be used to guide procedures such as surgery, biopsy, or radiation therapy.
description.long: CT scan head or brain without dye.

description.gpt3: A CT scan of the face and jaw without dye is a special kind of x-ray that gives pictures of the inside of the head. Doctors use it to look for problems with the bones or teeth, or to check for certain types of cancer.
description.long: CT Scan of the face and jaw without dye.

description.gpt3: A CT (computed tomography) scan of the neck is a special kind of X-ray that takes detailed pictures of the structures inside the neck. The CT scan is often done with dye, which is injected into the bloodstream through a small IV (intravenous) line in the arm. The dye helps the doctors to see the blood vessels in the neck more clearly.
description.long: CT scan of neck with dye.

description.gpt3:
Your brain stem is the lower part of your brain that connects to your spinal cord.MRI stands for magnetic resonance imaging. It uses strong magnets and radio waves to take pictures of the inside of your body. Doctors often use MRI to look at the brain and spine.

In this case, the doctor is using MRI to take a picture of the brain stem without any dye. Dye is sometimes used during MRI to help make the images clearer. But in this case, the doctor wants to take a picture of the brain stem without dye.
description.long: MRI of brain stem without dye.

description.gpt3: In order for doctors to see a person's brain stem, they need to do an MRI scan. This is a scan of the brain that uses magnetic waves and does not involve any x-rays. The MRI machine can take pictures of the brain stem before and after the person has been injected with a special dye. This dye helps the doctors to see the brain stem more clearly.
description.long: MRI scan of brain before and after contrast.

description.gpt3: This is an X-Ray of a person's chest. It shows the heart, lungs, and other organs in the chest. The doctor can use this to see if there are any problems with the person's chest.
description.long: Single view.

description.gpt3: A chest x-ray is a test that uses radiation to take a picture of the inside of your child's chest. This test is used to look for problems in the lungs, such as infections, Asthma, and Cancer. The x-ray machine will take two pictures of your child's chest, one from the front and one from the back.
description.long: 2 views, front and back.

description.gpt3: A chest X-ray is a picture of the inside of the chest, including the lungs. The doctor will take three different pictures from different angles to get a clear view of everything.
description.long: 3 views.

description.gpt3: A "71048" is a code used by doctors and insurance companies to describe a chest X-ray that includes four or more views. This means that the X-ray machine took pictures of the patient's chest from four different angles.
description.long: 4 or more views.

description.gpt3: This is a medical procedure where a doctor or technician uses a machine called an X-ray to take a picture of the inside of your chest. They will usually only do one side at a time so they can compare the two sides and look for any problems.
description.long: Radiologic examination of one side of the chest/ribs.

description.gpt3: A CT (computed tomography) scan is an x-ray that produces cross-sectional images of the body. A CT scan of the thorax (chest) is used to look at the lungs and heart. CT scans are performed with and without contrast dye. The contrast dye helps to better visualize certain structures within the body.
description.long: CT scan of the thorax without dye.

description.gpt3: A CT scan of the thorax is an x-ray of the chest that uses special software to create cross-sectional images, or slices, of the inside of the chest. The images are then examined by a radiologist to look for any abnormalities.
description.long: CT scan of the thorax with dye.

description.gpt3: An angiography is a medical procedure used to look at the blood vessels in your chest. A small, thin tube called a catheter is inserted into an artery in your arm and threaded through your body to the arteries in your chest. Once the catheter is in place, a special dye is injected into the artery. The dye makes the arteries show up on x-ray images. The x-ray images are used to figure out if there are any blockages in the arteries.
description.long: Diagnostic Radiology (Diagnostic Imaging) Procedures of the Chest.

description.gpt3: A radiologic examination is a special kind of X-ray that is used to look at the neck and spine. The examination will take two to three different views, or pictures, of the neck and spine.
description.long: Radiologic examination of the neck/spine, 2-3 views.

description.gpt3: In order to get a clear idea of what is going on with the neck and spine, pictures are taken from different angles. This is called an X-ray examination of the neck and spine. 4-5 views means that pictures are taken from 4-5 different angles.
description.long: Radiologic examination of the neck/spine, 4-5 views.

description.gpt3: An X-ray examination of the middle spine, 2 views means that two X-ray pictures will be taken of the middle part of the spine.
description.long: Radiologic examination of the middle spine, 2 views.

description.gpt3: The doctor is going to take three pictures of your middle spine. They will use a machine called an x-ray to take the pictures.
description.long: Radiologic examination of the middle spine, 3 views.

description.gpt3: This is an X-ray of your lower spine, looking at it from the front, back, and side. This will help your doctor see any problems with your spine.
description.long: X-ray of the lower spine 2-3 views.

description.gpt3:
An X-ray is a test that uses radiation to take pictures of the inside of your body. The X-ray machine will shoot a beam of radiation through your body and onto film. Different parts of your body absorb different amounts of radiation. This is what makes the different parts of your body look different on the film.

A spinal X-ray is a type of X-ray that is used to take pictures of the lower spine. The lower spine is made up of the bones in your lower back. The X-ray will show 4 different views of the lower spine.
description.long: X-ray of lower and sacral spine, minimum of 4 views.

description.gpt3: A CT scan is a type of X-ray that produces detailed cross-sectional images of your body. CT scans are used to diagnose and stage many types of cancers, including cancer of the lumbar spine (lower back). A CT scan of the lower spine without dye is used to create images of the bones and surrounding tissues in the lower back. The CT scan can help determine the size and location of any tumors in the lower spine and whether they have spread to nearby tissues.
description.long: CT scan of lower spine without dye.

description.gpt3: An MRI is a machine that uses strong magnets and radio waves to take pictures of the inside of your body. Usually, when you have an MRI, you have to lie still inside the machine for about 30 minutes while it takes the pictures. An MRI of the neck or spine without dye means that the machine will take pictures of your neck or spine without using any dye.
description.long: MRI of the neck or spine without dye.

description.gpt3: An MRI is a machine that uses magnets and radio waves to take pictures of your insides. Usually, doctors will use dye to help them see the pictures better, but sometimes they don't need it.

description.gpt3: An MRI is a machine that uses magnetic waves to take pictures of the inside of your body. Doctors use MRIs to look at your spine, or back, to see if there are any problems.

description.gpt3: An MRI is a special kind of scan that uses magnetic fields and radio waves to take pictures inside the body. This particular MRI is looking at the neck and spine, both with and without dye. The dye helps doctors to see the pictures more clearly.

description.gpt3: The dye is used to help see the images better. The MRI machine takes pictures of the inside of your body and the dye makes it easier to see those pictures.

description.gpt3: An MRI exports pictures of inside the body. This machine will take pictures of the lower back with and without dye. Dye is put into the body for some pictures to make it easier to see what is happening.

description.gpt3: A doctor or other health professional uses an X-ray machine to take a picture of the pelvis. This exam can help find problems with the bones, joints, or other structures in the pelvis.
description.long: Radiologic examination of the pelvis.

description.gpt3: A CT scan of the pelvis uses X-rays to take pictures of the bones in the pelvis. Usually, a dye is injected into the body before the CT scan, so that the pictures will show up better. But sometimes the dye is not necessary, which is what this CT scan is for.
description.long: CT of pelvis without dye.

description.gpt3: A CT scan of the pelvis is a special X-ray that takes pictures of the pelvis (the area between the hip bones). The CT scan can show if there are any problems with the bones or tissues in the pelvis. The test is also called a computed tomography scan, or just a CT scan.
description.long: CT scan, pelvis, with contrast.

description.gpt3: An MRI is a type of scan that uses magnets and radio waves to take pictures of the inside of your body. An MRI of the pelvis is a scan of the pelvis area without using any dye.
description.long: MRI of pelvis without dye.

description.gpt3: The doctor is going to use a machine to take pictures of your pelvis (the area around your hip), both before and after injecting a dye. The dye makes it easier to see things on the MRI.
description.long: MRI of pelvis before and after dye.

description.gpt3: This is a medical procedure where a doctor takes a special X-ray of your collar bone. They do this to look for things like broken bones or tumors.

description.gpt3: A doctor wants to take a look at your shoulder using an X-ray machine. This machine uses a special kind of light called X-rays to take pictures of the inside of your body. The doctor will put your shoulder on a table and then take the X-ray picture.

A magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) machine is a large machine that uses strong magnets and radio waves to take pictures inside your body. Doctors use MRIs to look at your bones and joints.

description.gpt3: A basic metabolic panel is a group of tests that are usually done together to give information about how your body is using energy and what your kidneys are doing.

description.gpt3: This is a test to see what levels of electrolytes are in your blood. Electrolytes are minerals that help your body keep fluids in balance. description.gpt3: If you are pregnant, your obstetrician (doctor who specializes in pregnancy) may order a blood test panel to check on your health and the health of your baby. This panel may include tests to check your blood type and Rh factor, hemoglobin (iron) levels, and blood cell counts. The panel may also check for infections, such as HIV and hepatitis, and for sexually transmitted diseases.
description.long: Obstetric blood test panel.

description.gpt3: A lipid panel is a blood test that measures the levels of cholesterol and triglycerides in your blood. Cholesterol is a type of fat that is found in your blood. Triglycerides are another type of fat that is found in your blood.

description.gpt3: The renal function panel is a test that is done to see how well your kidneys are working. The test measures the levels of different substances in your blood, including creatinine and urea. Creatinine is a waste product that is made by your muscles. Urea is a waste product that is made by your liver. The test also measures the level of potassium in your blood. Potassium is a mineral that is found in many foods.
description.long: Kidney function panel test.

description.gpt3: The acute hepatitis panel is a test that measures the levels of certain enzymes and proteins in your blood. These enzymes and proteins are associated with liver inflammation. The test can help your doctor determine if you have acute hepatitis, which is a short-term liver inflammation.

description.gpt3: A liver function blood test panel is a group of tests that are usually done together to check how well your liver is working. The tests look at things like the level of enzymes in your blood or how well your liver is able to make proteins.

description.gpt3: This is a blood test that looks for different things that could affect a pregnant woman and her baby. The test checks for things like hepatitis B, HIV, and syphilis, which are diseases that can be passed from a mother to her baby. It also checks for rubella, which is a virus that can cause birth defects.

description.gpt3: The 80197 ASSAY OF TACROLIMUS is a test that is used to measure the amount of the drug in the blood to determine whether the concentration has reached a therapeutic level and is below the toxic level. This test is important because it can help to make sure that a person is taking the right amount of the drug, and it can also help to prevent a person from taking too much of the drug and experiencing harmful side effects.

description.gpt3: The 80307 drug test is a test that checks for the presence of drugs in your body. The test is done by taking a sample of your blood or urine and testing it for the presence of drugs.

description.gpt3: When you go to the doctor and they want to test your urine, they may do a manual urinalysis. This means that they will look at your urine under a microscope. They may also use a scope, which is a small, hand-held camera, to look at your urine.

description.gpt3: The 81003 urinalysis is a test that can be done either manually or with a machine. With the manual method, a person looks at the urine under a microscope to look for things that shouldn't be there. With the automated method, a machine does the same thing. The machine is usually more accurate than the manual method.

description.gpt3: This test is used to find out how much creatinine is in someone's urine. Creatinine is a waste product that is made by the muscles and released into the blood. It is then passed out of the body in urine. This test is useful in finding out how well the kidneys are working.

description.gpt3: When clinicians order blood gas testing, they are looking for information about the acidity (pH), carbon dioxide, and oxygen levels in a person's blood. The test can be done on a sample of blood from an artery (arterial blood gas, or ABG) or from a vein (venous blood gas, or VBG).

description.gpt3: This is a test to see how much sugar is in your blood.

description.gpt3: A glucose tolerance test is a way to test if someone is likely to get gestational diabetes. During the test, a health care provider will take a person's blood sugar levels before and after they drink a sugary drink. If the person's blood sugar levels are high after drinking the sugary drink, it may mean that they are at risk for gestational diabetes.

description.gpt3: Gonadotropin is a hormone that helps to control the reproductive system. The gonadotropin test measures the amount of this hormone in the blood.

description.gpt3: A stomach bacterium called Helicobacter pylori (H. pylori) can cause ulcers in the stomach and upper part of the small intestine. This test involves drinking a small amount of a compound called urea that has been tagged with a radioactive carbon atom (C-13). The urea is broken down by the H. pylori bacteria in the stomach, and the tagged carbon is exhaled in the breath. The amount of tagged carbon in the breath is measured to see if H. pylori is present.

description.gpt3: This is a test to measure your average blood sugar levels for the past 2-3 months.

description.gpt3: Chemical tests of the blood are important because they can help doctors understand what is happening inside the body. The test measures the presence or concentration of a substance in the blood, which can give doctors information about the person's health.

description.gpt3: The 83540 ASSAY OF IRON is a blood test to measure the amount of iron that is in transit in the body. This test is used to help diagnose iron deficiency anemia or other conditions associated with iron deficiency.
description.long: Blood test to measure the amount of iron that is in transit in the body.

description.gpt3:
If you have ever given blood, the nurses may have told you that your blood is made up of several different things including red blood cells, white blood cells, and plasma. Each part of your blood has a special job. Red blood cells carry oxygen to your body's cells and remove carbon dioxide. White blood cells help fight infection. Plasma is the liquid part of your blood that carries the red blood cells and the white blood cells.

Iron is a mineral that is found in food and it is also found in your blood. Your body needs iron to make hemoglobin. Hemoglobin is what gives your blood its red color and it is also what helps carry oxygen to your cells. If you don't have enough iron in your blood, you can become very tired and your skin may look pale.
description.long: Blood test that measures the amount of iron carried in the blood.

description.gpt3: The 83655 ASSAY OF LEAD is a blood test to determine the concentration of lead in the blood.
description.long: Blood test to determine the concentration of lead in the blood.

description.gpt3: A blood test to measure the level of lipoproteins in the blood is called the 83718 assay of lipoproteins. This test can help determine your risk for heart disease and stroke.
description.long: Blood test to measure the level of lipoproteins in the blood.

description.gpt3: The 83880 ASSAY OF NATRIURETIC PEPTIDE is a blood test that is used to diagnose heart failure. This test measures the level of a substance called natriuretic peptide in your blood. Natriuretic peptide is made by your heart and helps regulate the amount of sodium and water in your body.
description.long: Blood test used to diagnose heart failure.

description.gpt3: A prealbumin blood test is done to measure the level of prealbumin in your blood. Prealbumin is a protein that is made by your liver. It is found in your blood and helps to keep your body from losing protein.
description.long: Blood test to measure level of prealbumin.

description.gpt3: 84153 is a code for a specific medical test - the Assay of PSA Total. PSA (prostate specific antigen) is a protein produced by the prostate gland. The test measures the amount of PSA in the blood.
description.long: PSA (prostate specific antigen).

description.gpt3: The PSA test is a blood test that measures the level of prostate specific antigen (PSA) in your blood. PSA is a protein produced by the prostate gland. The PSA level in your blood may be increased if you have prostate cancer or other conditions that affect the prostate gland.
A blood test to measure a type of thyroid hormone called thyroxine.
description.long: Blood test to measure a type of thyroid hormone.

description.gpt3: A free thyroxine (T4) assay is a blood test to measure the level of free T4 in your blood. T4 is a thyroxine hormone that is produced by your thyroid gland. It is responsible for regulating your metabolism.
description.long: Blood test to evaluate thyroid function.

description.gpt3: The thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH) is a blood test that measures the amount of thyroid stimulating hormone in your blood. TSH is produced by the pituitary gland and helps to regulate the thyroid gland.
description.long: Blood test, thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH).

description.gpt3: A blood test is when a doctor takes a sample of your blood to test it in a lab. The '84460 ALANINE AMINO (ALT) (SGPT)' test is a liver function test. The liver is a big organ in your body that helps to filter blood. This test is looking at a specific protein, called Alanine Amino, to see how well the liver is working.
description.long: Blood test to evaluate liver function.

description.gpt3: The T3 blood test is a test to check how well your thyroid is working. The thyroid is a small gland in your neck that makes hormones that control your metabolism. The T3 blood test measures the level of thyroid hormone in your blood.
description.long: Blood test to evaluate thyroid function.

description.gpt3: A troponin test is a blood test that measures the level of troponin in your blood. Troponin is a protein that is released into the blood when the heart muscle is damaged. The troponin test can be used to determine if there has been heart muscle damage and to help diagnose a heart attack.
description.long: Blood test to measure a certain protein in the blood to determine heart muscle damage.

description.gpt3: A chorionic gonadotropin (CG) assay is a blood test used to assess for pregnancy. The test measures the level of CG, a hormone produced by the placenta during pregnancy. CG levels can be used to confirm pregnancy, determine how far along a pregnancy is, and assess the risk of miscarrying.
description.long: Blood test to assess for pregnancy.

description.gpt3: The 85007 BL SMEAR W/DIFF WBC COUNT is a blood test that helps doctors assess whether or not a person has an infection. This test specifically looks for a type of white blood cell called a neutrophil. Neutrophils are a type of white blood cell that help the body fight off infection.
description.long: Blood test to assess for infection.

description.gpt3: A hemoglobin test is a blood test to measure levels of hemoglobin.
description.long: Blood test to measure levels of hemoglobin.

description.gpt3: A complete blood cell count, or CBC, is a test that measures the cells that make up your blood. This includes red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets. The top of the graph is the total amount of air that was taken in and the bottom is the total air that was breathed out.
description.long: Graphical representation of inspiration and expiration.

description.gpt3: The 94726 PULM FUNCT TST PLETHYSMOGRAP measures how much air is in the lungs after taking a deep breath. This is done by measuring the amount of air that is exhaled after taking a deep breath in.
description.long: Measures how much air is in the lungs after taking a deep breath.

description.gpt3: A person's lung function and gas exchange can be measured by the 94727 PULM FUNCTION TEST. This test can help to determine how well the lungs are working and how well they are exchanging gases.
description.long: Measure of lung function and gas exchange.

description.gpt3: A person's lung capacity is how much air they can breathe in and out. The higher the lung capacity, the more air you can breathe out. A person's ability to diffuse gases across their lung surfaces is how well they can move oxygen and carbon dioxide in and out of their lungs. The better a person can diffuse gases, the higher their lung capacity will be.
description.long: Test to measure how well gases diffuse across lung surfaces.

description.gpt3:
A doctor or nurse will put a small drop of liquid on your skin. This liquid usually has a tiny amount of an allergen in it. The allergen is the thing you might be allergic to, like pet dander, pollen, or dust mites.

The doctor or nurse will then use a small tool to prick or scratch your skin with the allergen. If you're allergic to something, you'll usually develop a red, itchy bump on your skin within about 20 minutes.
description.long: Allergy test.

description.gpt3: People can have different allergies to different things. For example, someone may be allergic to pollen from flowers, or to pet dander. Allergy shots are a way to help people who have allergies by injecting them with a small amount of the allergen. The goal is to help the person's body get used to the allergen, so that they will not have as many or as severe allergies symptoms when they are around the allergen.
description.long: Allergy shot-1 shot.

description.gpt3: immunotherapy is a type of treatment that helps your body fight against allergies. The most common type of immunotherapy is allergy shots. Allergy shots are given as injections, usually in the arm. They contain small amounts of the things that you are allergic to. over time, your body will learn to better tolerate these things
description.long: Multiple allergy shots.

description.gpt3: A sleep study is a test done to find out how well a person sleeps. It is also called a polysomnogram. The test is done overnight in a sleep lab. A sleep study can help find out the cause of problems with sleep, such as sleep apnea.
description.long: Sleep monitoring of patient (6 years or older) in sleep lab.

description.gpt3: The doctor is going to hook up a machine called a CPAP to the patient to help them sleep better. The machine will monitor the patient's sleep and make sure they are getting enough oxygen.
description.long: Sleep monitoring of patient (6 years or older) in sleep lab using CPAP.

description.gpt3: A muscle test is a way to measure the electrical activity of muscles or nerves in one limb. This is done by placing electrodes on the skin over the muscles or nerves, and then connecting them to a machine that measures the electrical activity.
description.long: Test to measure electrical activity of muscles or nerves in 1 limb.

description.gpt3: A doctor or other medical professional attaches electrodes to a person's skin in order to measure the electrical activity of muscles or nerves in two limb. This test is often used to help diagnose problems with muscles or nerves.
description.long: Test to measure electrical activity of muscles or nerves in 2 limb.

description.gpt3: The test is checking to see if there is any damage to the nerves.
description.long: Test to assess for nerve damage.
description.short: MUSC TEST DONE W/N TEST COMP

description.gpt3: This is a test that doctors give to young children to see if they might have any developmental disabilities. The test consists of a series of questions and activities that the child is asked to do. The doctor then looks at the child's performance on the test to see if there are any areas of concern.
description.long: Childhood test to screen for developmental disabilities.

description.gpt3: A 96365 THER/PROPH/DIAG IV INF INIT is an intravenous infusion that is used for therapy, prophylaxis, or diagnosis. This is the initial infusion.
description.long: Intravenous infusion, for therapy, prophylaxis, or diagnosis-initial infusion.

description.gpt3: An IV infusion is when a medical professional inserts a needle into your vein in order to give you fluids, medicine, or blood. An IV infusion can be used for therapy, prophylaxis, or diagnosis. An IV infusion for therapy means that the IV is being used to treat a medical condition. An IV infusion for prophylaxis means that the IV is being used to prevent a medical condition. An IV infusion for diagnosis means that the IV is being used to help diagnose a medical condition. An IV infusion for additional infusions means that the IV is being used for more than one purpose.
description.long: Intravenous infusion, for therapy, prophylaxis, or diagnosis-additional infusions.

description.gpt3: This is a code for a medical procedure where a liquid medication is injected into a vein using a syringe. The medication is pushed into the vein all at once (as opposed to being dripped in slowly over time). This type of injection is often used for treatments that need to act quickly, or for medications that cannot be taken by mouth.
description.long: Intravenous infusion, for therapy, prophylaxis, or diagnosis-IV push.

description.gpt3: This is a new drug that can be given intravenously (through the veins) for different conditions.
description.long: Intravenous infusion, for treatment, prophylaxis, or diagnosis-new drug add on.

description.gpt3: This means that you are adding on a drug to an existing intravenous infusion. The new drug is for treatment, prophylaxis (prevention), or diagnosis.
description.long: Intravenous infusion, for treatment, prophylaxis, or diagnosis-same drug add on.

description.gpt3: Chemotherapy is a medical treatment that uses chemicals to kill cancer cells. chemotherapy infusion is when chemotherapy drugs are slowly given through a vein (IV) over a period of time. 96415 CHEMO IV INFUSION ADDL HR is a code used by medical professionals to indicate that an additional hour is needed for the chemotherapy infusion.
description.long: Chemotherapy infusion-each additional hour.

description.gpt3: This means that the person is receiving additional IV pushes of the same chemotherapy medication.
description.long: Chemotherapy infusion-additional IV pushes of the same medication.
description.short: CHEMO IV INFUS EACH ADDL SEQ

description.gpt3: A 97010 code means that the patient was given external hot or cold packs therapy. This is a type of therapy where the patient uses either hot or cold packs to help with pain relief.
description.long: Use of external hot or cold packs.

description.gpt3:
Decompression therapy is a treatment that is used to help relieve pain in the spine. The spine is a column of bones in the back that support the body. The spinal cord runs through the spine and carries messages between the brain and the rest of the body.

In decompression therapy, a machine is used to apply a gentle traction force to the spine. This force stretches the spine and takes pressure off of the spinal cord and the nerves. This can help to relieve pain and improve function.
description.long: Form of decompression therapy of the spine.

description.gpt3: Electric Stimulation Therapy is when you use a machine to send electrical signals to your body. This can help reduce pain or help your muscles work better.
description.long: One time use unattended.

description.gpt3: The machine pumps cold water into an inflatable wrap or brace, compressing the enveloped area of the body.
description.long: Machines designed to pump cold water into an inflatable wrap or brace, compressing the enveloped area of the body.

description.gpt3: Infrared therapy is a light-based method used to treat pain and inflammation. The therapy uses infrared light to penetrate the skin and promote healing. Infrared therapy is often used to treat conditions such as arthritis, muscle pain, and chronic pain.
description.long: Light-based method to treat pain and inflammation.

description.gpt3: In electrical stimulation, a person attaches electrodes to their skin. These electrodes send electrical signals to the body, which can help relieve pain.
description.long: Repeated application to one or more parts of the body.

description.gpt3: Mental disorders are illnesses that can make it hard for a person to think, feel, and behave normally. Seizures are sudden, uncontrolled electrical impulses that happen in the brain. During electric current therapy, doctors use electricity to trigger a seizure in the brain. This can provide relief from mental disorders for some people.
description.long: Psychiatric treatment in which seizures are electrically induced in patients to provide relief from mental disorders.

description.gpt3: Ultrasound therapy is a technique that uses sound waves to treat various medical conditions. It is most commonly used to help alleviate inflammation and pain from injuries. The sound waves help to increase blood flow and decrease swelling in the affected area.
description.long: Use of sound waves to treat medical problems, especially musculoskeletal problems like inflammation from injuries.

description.gpt3: 97110 THERAPEUTIC EXERCISES is a code used to describe therapeutic exercises that are done to develop strength, endurance, range of motion, and flexibility. Each of these exercises takes 15 minutes.
description.long: Therapeutic exercise to develop strength, endurance, range of motion, and flexibility, each 15 minutes.

description.gpt3: There are lots of different ways that people can move their bodies, and sometimes people end up moving in patterns that are not very helpful or healthy. This can happen when people have an injury, or when they have a condition that makes it hard to move normally. Neuromuscular reeducation is a way for physical therapists to help people learn how to move their bodies in healthy patterns again.
description.long: A technique used by physical therapists to restore normal body movement patterns.

description.gpt3: Aquatic therapy is the use of water to help with physical therapy. This can be done by doing exercises in the water or by using the water to help with massage.
description.long: Use of water for therapy/exercises.

description.gpt3: Gait training is a type of physical therapy that helps people learn how to walk correctly. This type of therapy can be helpful for people who have problems with their balance or who have trouble walking.
description.long: A type of physical therapy.

description.gpt3: 97124 Massage Therapy is the use of massage to treat or improve conditions in the body. Massage therapy can be used to relieve pain, relax muscles, increase circulation, and decrease stress.
description.long: Use of massage.

description.gpt3: Manual therapy is when a healthcare provider uses their hands to help treat your medical condition. This might involve gentle pushing, pulling, or moving of the body in order to help relieve pain or improve movement.
description.long: Manipulation of 1 or more regions of the body.

description.gpt3: 97530 THERAPEUTIC ACTIVITIES means using multiple parameters, such as balance, strength, and range of motion, for a functional activity.
description.long: Incorporates the use of multiple parameters, such as balance, strength, and range of motion, for a functional activity.

description.gpt3: This means that someone is getting occupational therapy to help them with self care management training. This could involve learning how to better take care of oneself, how to manage one's time, or how to do things around the house more efficiently.
description.long: Occupational therapy.

description.gpt3: Debridement is when you clean out a wound.
description.long: Debridement (for example, high pressure waterjet with/without suction, sharp selective debridement with scissors, scalpel, and forceps).

description.gpt3: Acupuncture involves putting thin needles into the skin at different points on the body. The needles are usually left in for a short time before being removed.
description.long: Acupuncture without stimulation.

description.gpt3:
Acupuncture is a technique that involves sticking thin needles into the skin at specific points on the body. It is used to help relieve pain or treat other conditions.

With stimulation, this means that the needles will be connected to a device that gives them a small electrical current. This is done to help increase the effectiveness of the acupuncture.
description.long: Acupuncture with stimulation.

description.gpt3: This means that a chiropractor will provide spinal manipulative therapy in one to two areas of the spine. This is done by applying pressure to the joints in the spine in order to reduce pain and improve range of motion.
description.long: Chiropractic manipulation in 1-2 regions.

description.gpt3: This means that the person will be receiving chiropractic manipulation in three to four different areas of their body.
description.long: Chiropractic manipulation in 3-4 regions.

description.gpt3: Chiropractic manipulation is when a doctor uses their hands to move a person's joints. The spinal cord is the long, thin bundle of nerves that runs down the middle of the back. Chiropractic manipulation is when a doctor uses their hands to move a person's joints that are not in the spinal cord.
description.long: Chiropractic manipulation not of the spine.

description.gpt3: This is a service where a doctor or other medical professional will talk to you on the phone for 5-10 minutes to assess your situation and figure out a plan for treatment.
description.long: Telephone assessment and management service, 5-10 minutes of medical discussion.

description.gpt3: This is a code for a medical service. It means that a doctor or other health care provider will talk to a patient on the phone for 11-20 minutes. During this time, they will assess the patient's condition and discuss possible treatments.
description.long: Telephone assessment and management service, 11-20 minutes of medical discussion.

description.gpt3: A telephone assessment and management service is when a doctor or other medical professional talks to a patient over the phone to discuss their medical condition. This service usually lasts for 21-30 minutes.
description.long: Telephone assessment and management service, 21-30 minutes of medical discussion.

description.gpt3: A qualified non-physician health care professional is an online doctor who can provide medical assessments and management for an established patient. This service can be provided for up to 7 days, with a maximum of 10 minutes per day.
description.long: Qualified non physician health care professional online digital assessment and management, for an established patient, for up to 7 days, cumulative time during the 7 days; 5-10 minutes.
description.short: Qualified non physician health care professional online digital assessment and management est. patient 5-10 minutes

description.gpt3: This code means that a qualified non-physician health care professional (such as a nurse) will perform an online assessment and management of an established patient, lasting 11-20 minutes. This may occur over a period of up to 7 days, and the total time spent on this activity over the 7 days may not exceed 20 minutes.
description.long: Qualified non physician health care professional online digital assessment and management, for an established patient, for up to 7 days, cumulative time during the 7 days; 11-20 minutes.
description.short: Qualified non physician health care professional online digital assessment and management est. patient 11-20 minutes

description.gpt3: This code is for when a qualified non-physician health care professional (like a nurse or a physician assistant) provides online digital assessment and management services to an established patient. These services can be provided for up to 7 days, and can cumulatively total 21 or more minutes.
description.long: Qualified non physician health care professional online digital assessment and management, for an established patient, for up to 7 days, cumulative time during the 7 days; 21 or more minutes.
description.short: Qualified non physician health care professional online digital assessment and management for est. patients 21+ minutes

description.gpt3: If you need a medical service during evening, weekends, or holiday hours, you would use this code.
description.long: Medical service during off-hours.

description.gpt3: A doctor or other medical professional uses a special chart with different sized letters to test how well a person can see. The person being tested looks at the chart and reads the letters aloud. The doctor or other medical professional writes down how well the person did.
description.long: Eye test.

description.gpt3: The doctor will see you now! A 99201 office/outpatient visit is for new patients who need to see a doctor for the first time, or for patients who haven't been to see that doctor in a while. The visit will usually last around 10 minutes.
description.long: New patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 10 minutes.

description.gpt3: This is the type of doctor's visit you would have if you had never been to this doctor's office before. It would last for about 20 minutes.
description.long: New patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 20 minutes.

description.gpt3: If you're sick and go to see the doctor for the first time, or if you go to the doctor for a checkup and you haven't seen them in a while, they will code your visit as a "99203 office/outpatient visit."
description.long: New patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 30 min.

description.gpt3: A 99204 office/outpatient visit is a visit to a doctor's office or outpatient clinic. This is for a new patient who has never seen this doctor before, and it typically lasts 45 minutes.
description.long: New patient office of other outpatient visit, typically 45 min.

description.gpt3: This is the code for a doctor's appointment for a new patient who is not in the hospital. The visit usually lasts about an hour.
description.long: New patient office of other outpatient visit, typically 60 min.

description.gpt3: In very simple terms, this is a visit to a doctor's office for someone who has seen the doctor before and does not need to see a physician.
description.long: Outpatient visit of established patient not requiring a physician.

description.gpt3: The 99212 code is for an office or outpatient visit for an established patient who requires a physician.
description.long: Outpatient visit of established patient requiring a physician.

description.gpt3: This is a code used by doctors to bill for an office visit. The code indicates that the visit was for an established patient, which means that the patient has seen the doctor before. The code also indicates that the visit lasted for 15 minutes.
description.long: Established patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 15 minutes.

description.gpt3: A 99214 office visit is for an established patient, which means that the doctor has seen the patient before. This visit is for an office visit, which means that it takes place in the doctor's office, and it is typically 25 minutes long.
description.long: Established patient office or other outpatient visit, typically 25 minutes.

description.gpt3: This means that the doctor will spend about 40 minutes with the patient.
description.long: Established patient office or other outpatient, visit typically 40 minutes.

description.gpt3: The doctor will talk to the patient about their problem, and then talk to them about what can be done to help fix the problem.
description.long: Patient office consultation, typically 40 min.

description.gpt3: A 99244 office consultation is when a doctor meets with a patient to discuss a medical issue. This usually lasts for 60 minutes.
description.long: Patient office consultation, typically 60 min.

description.gpt3: A 99283 Emergency dept visit is when you go to the Emergency department because you have a moderately severe problem.
description.long: Emergency department visit, moderately severe problem.

description.gpt3: This means that a person went to the hospital because they had a problem that was very severe.
description.long: Emergency department visit, problem of high severity.

description.gpt3: When someone is experiencing a problem that could be life-threatening, they go to the emergency department at the hospital. The doctor or nurse will assess the situation and provide care as needed.
description.long: Emergency department visit, problem with significant threat to life or function.

description.gpt3: 99381 is a code used to bill for a doctor's visit for a new patient who is an infant.
description.long: Initial visit for an infant.
description.short: INIT PM E/M NEW PAT INFANT

description.gpt3: This is a medical code for a doctor's visit. The first part (99382) is the code for the type of visit. The second part (INIT) means that it's the patient's first visit. The third part (PM) means that it's a preventive medicine visit. The fourth part (E/M) means that it will be an evaluation and management visit. The fifth part (NEW PAT 1-4 YRS) means that the patient is 1-4 years old.
description.long: Initial visit for new patients 1-4 years old.
description.short: INIT PM E/M NEW PAT 1-4 YRS

description.gpt3: When you go to the doctor, sometimes they will do a preventative visit. That means they will talk to you about staying healthy and talk to you about things you can do to avoid getting sick. They might also do a physical exam and some basic tests.
description.long: New preventative visit in new patients 5-11 years old.

description.gpt3: In order to provide the best care possible, doctors will often look at a patient's recent history. This code, 99384, is for a preventative visit for a new patient who is between 12 and 17 years old. This allows the doctor to track the patient's health and look for any red flags that might indicate a more serious problem.
description.long: New preventative visit in new patients 12-17 years old.

description.gpt3: A 99385 PREV VISIT NEW AGE 18-39 is an initial new patient preventive medicine evaluation for someone who is 18 to 39 years old.
description.long: Initial new patient preventive medicine evaluation (18-39 years).

description.gpt3: A "preventive medicine evaluation" is a checkup with a doctor to make sure you're healthy and to find out if there's anything you can do to stay healthy. The "99386" is a code that tells the insurance company what kind of visit this is. "New Age 40-64" means that this is for someone who is between the ages of 40 and 64 and who has never had this kind of visit before.
description.long: Initial new patient preventive medicine evaluation (40-64 years).

description.gpt3: The code 99387 stands for an initial preventive medicine (E/M) visit for a new patient who is 65 years of age or older.
description.long: Initial visit for new patients 65 and older years old.
description.short: INIT PM E/M NEW PAT 65+ YRS

description.gpt3: This is a code for a doctor's visit where the doctor will do a check-up on an infant patient that the doctor has seen before.
description.long: Periodic primary re-evaluation for an established infant patient.
description.short: PER PM REEVAL EST PAT INFANT

description.gpt3: This means that this is the first visit to the doctor for a child who is between 1 and 4 years old.
description.long: Initial visit for new patients 1-4 years old.

description.gpt3: This means that a new patient who is between the ages of 5 and 11 years old will have a preventative visit at the doctor's office. This is usually a check-up to make sure the patient is healthy and to talk about any concerns the parents or child may have.
description.long: New preventative visit in new patients 5-11 years old.

description.gpt3: This means that a new patient, who is between 12 and 17 years old, will have a preventative visit.
description.long: New preventative visit in new patients 12-17 years old.

description.gpt3: This is a medical code for an established patient (someone who has been to the doctor before) between the ages of 18 and 39 who is coming in for a "periodic preventive medicine examination."
description.long: Established patient periodic preventive medicine examination age 18-39 years.

description.gpt3: This means that the patient is over 40 but younger than 64, and that this is a routine checkup to prevent illness.
description.long: Established patient periodic preventive medicine examination age 40-64 years.

description.gpt3: This code is used when a doctor does a periodic check-up on a patient who is 65 years old or older.
description.long: Periodic primary re-evaluation for an established patient 65 and older.
description.short: PER PM REEVAL EST PAT 65+ YR

description.gpt3: The 99421 code is for an online digital evaluation and management service for an established patient. The code can be used for up to 7 days, with a maximum of 10 minutes per day.
description.long: Online digital evaluation and management service, for an established patient, for up to 7 days, cumulative time during the 7 days; 5-10 minutes.
description.short: ONLINE DIGITAL EVALUATION AND MANAGEMENT SERVICE; 5-10 MINUTES

description.gpt3: In order to be able to charge for this service, the provider must do an online evaluation and management service that takes 11-20 minutes and is for an established patient (someone the provider has seen before) for up to 7 days.
description.long: Online digital evaluation and management service, for an established patient, for up to 7 days, cumulative time during the 7 days; 11-20 minutes.
description.short: Online digital evaluation and management service; 11-20 minutes

description.gpt3: This is a medical code for a physician telephone consultation service with a patient that is expected to last 5-10 minutes.
description.long: Physician telephone patient service, 5-10 minutes of medical discussion.

description.gpt3: This CPT code is used to report a physician telephone service to a patient, which includes 11-20 minutes of medical discussion.
description.long: Physician telephone patient service, 11-20 minutes of medical discussion.

description.gpt3: A physician telephone patient service is when a doctor calls a patient to discuss their medical care. This particular service is for 21-30 minutes of discussion.
description.long: Physician telephone patient service, 21-30 minutes of medical discussion.
